mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANIME (TITLE, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL, WEEKDAY, SCORE, TAGS) VALUES (#{TITLE}, #{THUMNAIL_GARO_URL}, #{THUMNAIL_SERO_URL}, #{WEEKDAY}, #{SCORE}, #{TAGS})
mapper.select: SELECT ANIME_ID, TITLE, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL, WEEKDAY, SCORE, TAGS FROM TBL_ANIME ORDER BY TITLE
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ANIME SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL = #{THUMNAIL_GARO_URL}, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL = #{THUMNAIL_SERO_URL}, WEEKDAY = #{WEEKDAY}, SCORE = #{SCORE}, TAGS = #{TAGS} WHERE ANIME_ID = #{ANIME_ID}
